articles.title: Seasonal allergies: It's not just you; here's why pollen allergies are worse than ever this spring - WLS-TV
articles.description: For roughly one in four American adults, spring blooms mark the start of itchy, eye-watering, congested misery.
articles.content:
For roughly 1 in 4 American adults, spring blooms mark the start of itchy, eye-watering, congested misery.
And looked at any number of ways, it's only getting worse: Experts agree that more people a… [+6088 chars]
